com.adidas.ui.app

Class AdidasDialog

  • java.lang.Object
    • DialogFragment
      • com.adidas.ui.app.AdidasDialog
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AdidasBasicDialog, AdidasInformationalPopover

    public abstract class AdidasDialog
extends DialogFragment
    Base class for dialog which are based on android.support.v4.app.DialogFragment. In order to pass additional data to dialogs various implementation of show(...) method were provided. In order to build UI AdidasDialogBuilder is being used in order to have common structure of UI (title + user provided UI) together with common theming in the app.
